name: XRSession.cancelAnimationFrame
description: The cancelAnimationFrame() method of the XRSession interface cancels an animation frame which was previously requested by calling requestAnimationFrame.
content:
Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

ThecancelAnimationFrame()method of the XRSession interface cancels an animation frame which was previously requested by calling requestAnimationFrame.
